20110119020105.000|20110119020105.000|CC1|    AND THEY WIELD POWER OVER   
20110119020105.000|20110119020109.000|CC1|    450 MILLION PEOPLE.         
20110119020109.000|20110119020109.000|CC1|    THEY'RE FAMOUS FOR THEIR    
20110119020109.000|20110119020112.000|CC1|    CHOCOLATE, THEIR BEER,      
20110119020112.000|20110119020112.000|CC1|        THEIR DIAMONDS,         
20110119020112.000|20110119020115.000|CC1|    AND THEIR FRENCH FRIES.     
20110119020115.000|20110119020115.000|CC1|    THEY HAVE A HISTORY

20110119020117.000|20110119020117.000|CC1|TO MEDIEVAL TIMES, AND THEIR    
20110119020117.000|20110119020121.000|CC1|CAPITAL CITIES ARE VERY MUCH    
20110119020121.000|20110119020123.000|CC1|    AT THE HEART OF EUROPE.     
20110119020123.000|20110119020123.000|CC1|    WELCOME TO BELGIUM          
20110119020123.000|20110119020139.000|CC1|    AND LUXEMBOURG.             
20110119020139.000|20110119020139.000|CC1|BELGIUM AND LUXEMBOURG ARE      
20110119020139.000|20110119020142.000|CC1|SITUATED IN WESTERN EUROPE,     
20110119020142.000|20110119020142.000|CC1|    AND THEY'RE SURROUNDED

20110119020350.000|20110119020350.000|CC1|BELGIUM'S MOST CELEBRATED       
20110119020350.000|20110119020354.000|CC1|ARTIST WAS PETER PAUL RUBENS,   
20110119020354.000|20110119020354.000|CC1|    AND HE WAS ONE OF           
20110119020354.000|20110119020356.000|CC1|THE FEW PAINTERS WHO ACHIEVED

20110119020356.000|20110119020359.000|CC1|OWN LIFETIME, AND HE USED HIS   
20110119020359.000|20110119020359.000|CC1|MONEY TO BUILD HIMSELF THIS     
20110119020359.000|20110119020402.000|CC1|BEAUTIFUL TOWNHOUSE, WHICH IS   
20110119020402.000|20110119020403.000|CC1|    MORE LIKE A TOWN MANSION,   
20110119020403.000|20110119020403.000|CC1|        HERE RIGHT              
20110119020403.000|20110119020409.000|CC1|    IN THE CENTER OF ANTWERP.   
20110119020409.000|20110119020409.000|CC1|RUBENS' FAME SPREAD FAR         
20110119020409.000|20110119020413.000|CC1|AND WIDE DURING HIS LIFETIME,   
20110119020413.000|20110119020413.000|CC1|    AND HE WAS ALWAYS           
20110119020413.000|20110119020415.000|CC1|    INUNDATED WITH WORK.        
20110119020415.000|20110119020415.000|CC1|HE SPENT MOST OF HIS CAREER     
20110119020415.000|20110119020417.000|CC1|DOING COMMISSIONS FOR THE RICH  
20110119020417.000|20110119020417.000|CC1|    AND FAMOUS OF THE TIME,     
20110119020417.000|20110119020420.000|CC1|    WHICH GAVE HIM THE MEANS

20110119020426.000|20110119020426.000|CC1|    THIS IS RUBENS' STUDIO,     
20110119020426.000|20110119020428.000|CC1|    WHERE HE USED TO WORK.      
20110119020428.000|20110119020428.000|CC1|THOSE BIG WINDOWS WITH ALL      
20110119020428.000|20110119020431.000|CC1|THE LIGHT FLOODING THROUGH.     
20110119020431.000|20110119020431.000|CC1|AND YOU HAVE TO REMEMBER THAT   
20110119020431.000|20110119020434.000|CC1|RUBENS DIDN'T JUST STAND HERE   
20110119020434.000|20110119020435.000|CC1|    PAINTING ALL ON HIS OWN.    
20110119020435.000|20110119020435.000|CC1|HE HAD MASSIVE TEAMS OF PEOPLE  
20110119020435.000|20110119020438.000|CC1|WORKING HERE, HELPING HIM

20110119020438.000|20110119020440.000|CC1|OF THOSE WOULD HAVE BEEN        
20110119020440.000|20110119020440.000|CC1|    APPRENTICES, AND SOME       
20110119020440.000|20110119020443.000|CC1|    OF THEM GRANDMASTERS.       
20110119020443.000|20110119020443.000|CC1|THEY MIGHT HAVE BEEN PERHAPS    
20110119020443.000|20110119020446.000|CC1|DRAWING THE INITIAL SHAPE       
20110119020446.000|20110119020446.000|CC1|OF THE PICTURE OR PERHAPS       
20110119020446.000|20110119020449.000|CC1|JUST DOING A HAND OR A FACE.    
20110119020449.000|20110119020449.000|CC1|SOME OF THEM WOULD HAVE BEEN    
20110119020449.000|20110119020451.000|CC1|MIXING THE COLORS, MIXING       
20110119020451.000|20110119020451.000|CC1|THE PAINTS, AND THEN, OF COURSE,
20110119020451.000|20110119020454.000|CC1|YOU WOULD HAVE HAD THE MODELS   
20110119020454.000|20110119020454.000|CC1|DRESSED IN THESE INCREDIBLY     
20110119020454.000|20110119020457.000|CC1|    ELABORATE OUTFITS,          
20110119020457.000|20110119020458.000|CC1|    WHICH THEY PAINTED.         
20110119020458.000|20110119020458.000|CC1|IT MUST HAVE BEEN LITERALLY     
20110119020458.000|20110119020524.000|CC1|HUMMING WITH PEOPLE.            
20110119020524.000|20110119020524.000|CC1|JUST DOWN THE ROAD FROM         
20110119020524.000|20110119020527.000|CC1|RUBENS' HOUSE IS THIS STUNNING  
20110119020527.000|20110119020527.000|CC1|CATHEDRAL OF ANTWERP, AND HERE  
20110119020527.000|20110119020530.000|CC1|YOU CAN SEE TWO OF RUBENS'      
20110119020530.000|20110119020536.000|CC1|    MOST IMPORTANT WORKS.       
20110119020536.000|20110119020536.000|CC1|THE TWO HUGE OIL ON PANEL       
20110119020536.000|20110119020539.000|CC1|PAINTINGS, "THE ASCENSION"      
20110119020539.000|20110119020539.000|CC1|AND "DESCENT OF CHRIST TO       
20110119020539.000|20110119020543.000|CC1|AND FROM THE CROSS" WERE PAINTED

20110119020741.000|20110119020742.000|CC1|    Katy: THIS IS THE BOURSE.   
20110119020742.000|20110119020742.000|CC1|IT'S ONE OF 4 EXCHANGES IN      
20110119020742.000|20110119020744.000|CC1|THE DISTRICT WHERE THE SALE     
20110119020744.000|20110119020747.000|CC1|OF ROUGH DIAMONDS TAKES PLACE.  
20110119020747.000|20110119020747.000|CC1|IT'S A BUSINESS THAT GOES       
20110119020747.000|20110119020749.000|CC1|BACK TO THE ARRIVAL OF SEVERAL  
20110119020749.000|20110119020749.000|CC1|PORTUGUESE JEWISH FAMILIES      
20110119020749.000|20110119020753.000|CC1|IN THE 16th CENTURY.            
20110119020753.000|20110119020753.000|CC1|                Katy: SO WHAT   
20110119020753.000|20110119020753.000|CC1|                ARE YOU LOOKING 
20110119020753.000|20110119020755.000|CC1|                FOR THEN, ARYE? 
20110119020755.000|20110119020755.000|CC1|        I'M JUST LOOKING
